text:
I have just received a SPAM email on the account I use solely for signing in to Hacker News.

Here is a paste link of the redacted raw email: https://pastebin.com/F63w3ZDC

I have not opened any remote content so I don't actually know what's in it.

Tell HN: Spammed by a Hacker News Enthusiast
text:
Someone has scraped my contact information from my profile and is sending me an unsolicted "HackerNews" newsletter.

People ... don't do that.

Yes, you have an unsubscribe link, but that doesn't excuse the unsolicited sending of a screencap of your rendering of "top stories".

At the end you say:

"You're receiving this email because you signed up on HackerNews"

That is a lie, and a tactic used by utter scum.

Be better.

Show HN: Document Tracking like a boss – Not another file transfer tool
text:
Apps like dropbox, and google drive, we transfer don't work in some parts of Asia (India, China, etc) for various reasons. It's pretty hard to share huge docs/slides/presentations to our vendors and customers in this part of the world.

I work for a small company and needed to solve this problem, so I built a tool that is multi-cloud backed on Cloudflare R2 + Alibaba Object Storage with a Vue js front-end. It does the job reasonably well. You can send 3gb of files to anyone and include a video message, too; please try it out and let me know what you think.

We have reasonably good usage of free users in both these countries and a number of businesses. I added an asynchronous video message feature that you can add to your outbound documents, this has helped increase document open rates; people tell me it helps close more deals.

Feel free to get in touch at rishi{dot}uttam@sinosend.com with your feedback. https://sinosend.com/
